name: Winter's Diamond
description:
A short fantasy game (part 1 demo) set in the Kingdom of Winter.

 Play as a nameable male or female character, and go on a relaxed quest to find a diamond!

Walk in the snow, make a friend,  take over the throne, get married, doom a city, seduce a guard, get thrown in jail, share some hot tea … there are lots of choices and lots of endings.

Please note: this demo is Part 1, which has... none of those endings.  It mainly involves wandering in the snow, and chatting. There are also apples.

Depending on player character and choices, the story is GxB or BxB with a route for both friendship or romance, or you can go questing on your own.

Warnings: contains screen shake.

This is a project in progress, but the full game will hopefully contain:

  • part 1 and 2 of the story
  • several endings and a lot more peril
  • additional artwork
  • updated backgrounds for those I didn’t reach in time.

The full game will also be free.

(Note from the Dev: I created this little project mainly to teach myself Ren’py, but decided to expand on it for the jam, with the help of some very talented people who have made it look and sound very beautiful. I hope anyone else with zero programming experience can look at it and see you can learn to make a game in 9 weeks (or less, but that's what this project was) so don't be afraid like I was of coding! ♥)
